subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: At the conclusion of his most challenging season since becoming a tennis star, Rafael Nadal has one challenge left: winning another Davis Cup in Barcelona and confirming Spain as the tennis team of the 2000s.
snippet: At the conclusion of his most challenging season since becoming a tennis star, Rafael Nadal has one challenge left: winning another Davis Cup in Barcelona and confirming Spain as the tennis team of the 2000s.
